title: On Top of Old Smokey
output:
On top of spaghetti,
All covered with {{1}},
I lost my {{2}} {{3}}ball,
When somebody {{4}}.

It rolled off the {{5}},
And on to the floor,
And then my {{2}} {{3}}ball,
Rolled out of the {{8}}.

It {{9}} into the garden,
And under a {{10}},
And then my {{2}} {{3}}ball,
Was nothing but mush.

The mush was as {{13}}
As {{13}} could be,
And then the next {{15}},
It {{16}} into a tree.

The tree was all covered,
All covered with {{17}},
And on it grew {{3}}balls,
And {{19}}.

So if you eat spaghetti,
All covered with {{1}},
Hold on to your {{3}}ball,
Whenever you {{22}}.
